favourite.article: Lord, thank You for including us in this wonderful oneness. Thank You for letting us see this vision. May we experience this oneness with the saints in the Triune God!
Oneness is such a precious thing. The Triune God in us. What a miracle and what marvelous grace to have Him living in us. That is the only way that we can be one. Thank You Lord Jesus.
This song was just sent to us from a home meeting. Oh! The Triune God in us. Now we are enjoying.
Hear, O Israel, Jehovah is our God; Jehovah is one. Deut. 6:4

Five phrases in Ephesians 4:1-3 give us a practical way to keep the onerness of the Spirit (the oneness of the Body of Christ), which is to practice the one accord: lowliness, meekness, long-suffering, bearing one another in love, and the uniting bond of peace; these five items are a test to us in the practice of the church life; by this test we can see whether or not we are practically in the church life.
The nature of the Triune God is oneness. Genuine oneness is not merely a matter of our meeting together but our oneness is the oneness of the organic Body of Christ. Amen!
Amen! This is the real oneness - the Triune God on us!
